Considering its value and your interest, we're extending this opportunity for you to acquire it for $10,000. This is a special offer tailored to recognize your appreciation for our product's quality and benefits. Don't miss out on this chance to own something truly exceptional. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
